question: 小さい順
sourceAnswer: Increasing Order, Ascending Order, Smallest First
activeAnswer: Increasing Order, Ascending Order, Smallest First
sourceMnemonic: When something goes from <kanji>small</kanji> and goes in <kanji>order</kanji> it's in <vocabulary>increasing order</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>smallest first</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the word <ja>小さい</ja> plus the reading for <ja>順</ja>.
